body: gyaru-oh is a revolting beings! fuck... i'm fine with them tbh, but if they were someone like these two assholes? i'm still prefer ugly bastard instead... at least they were already ugly to begin with so there's no much hate to be given....
Netorare generico la mujer una retrasada que se deja chantajear y como siempre el chantajista es un superdotado.
This is such fucking good just need the English translation.
